title: Which is faster - in terms of XP
body:
So just wondering, do you think it's faster going into Bot games and levelling up that way, or going into norms?

Just trying to get my account (smurf) to lvl 30.

And trying to find the fastest way possible.

replies.body: Coops is the easiest way to earn XP until you hit level 10, at which point you'll start earning less (10% less until you hit 20, then 20% less for the first 180 minutes per day followed by 35% less [refer to [this link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824)]). It's pretty easy to figure out how to handle the bots for an experienced player, so that can make coops go much easier. After you hit level 10 (and definitely once you hit level 20) you'd likely earn more XP playing PvP.

kk

SO what I got from this was:

0 - 10 = Bots

10 - 20 = Bots or PvP - But PvP is better

+20 = PvP

Pretty much, yeh. The XP drop just becomes too much to be of significant value beyond an easy first win once you hit level 20 (not so much level 10, but still a drop), and since the major factor of how much XP you earn is the duration of the game, it becomes better to just go with PvP at that point.

ARAMS or AI.

Short games, Short Queues.

I personally leveled my account just by playing 1 game a day and getting first win of the day bonus XP. You can get an account from 15-30 in like 7 weeks with 1 game a day.

Buy an XP boost, play 10-15 games a day and you can probably do it in like 3 days.

Jeez.

I don't really wanna spend money on this account.

Without the XP boost it'd take, what, 2 - 3 weeks?
